00031     std::vector<std::string> listModules()
00032     {
00033       std::vector<std::string> res;
00034       foreach(baseURBIStarter* s, baseURBIStarter::list())
00035       {
00036         res.push_back(s->name);
00037       }
00038       return res;
00039     }
00040   }

00042   static void noop(impl::UContextImpl*)
00043   {
00044   }
00045 
00046   static boost::thread_specific_ptr<impl::UContextImpl> current_context(&noop);
00047   static impl::UContextImpl* default_context = 0;
00048   impl::UContextImpl* getCurrentContext()
00049   {
00050     impl::UContextImpl* res = current_context.get();
00051     return res ? res : default_context;
00052   }
00053 
00054   void setCurrentContext(impl::UContextImpl* impl)
00055   {
00056     if (!default_context)
00057       default_context = impl;
00058     current_context.reset(impl);
00059   }

00066   UGenericCallback::UGenericCallback(UObject& owner,

00069                                      const std::string& name,
00070                                      int size,
00071                                      impl::UContextImpl* ctx)

00078     , owner(owner)
00079     , synchronous_(true)

00081     impl_ = ctx_->getGenericCallbackImpl();

00113   bool
00114   UGenericCallback::isSynchronous() const
00115   {
00116     return synchronous_;

00118 
00119   void
00120   UGenericCallback::syncEval(UList& params, OnDone onDone)
00121   {
00122     UValue res;
00123     try {
00124       res = __evalcall(params);
00125       if (onDone)
00126         onDone(res, 0);
00127     }
00128     catch(const std::exception& e)
00129     {
00130       if (onDone)
00131         onDone(res, &e);
00132     }
00133     catch(...)
00134     {
00135       if (onDone)
00136       {
00137         std::runtime_error e("Invalid exception");
00138         onDone(res, &e);
00139       }
00140     }
00141   }
00142 
00143   void
00144   UGenericCallback::eval(UList& params, OnDone onDone)
00145   {
00146     if (synchronous_)
00147     {
00148       syncEval(params, onDone);
00149     }
00150     else
00151     {
00152       threadPool().queueTask(
00153                              boost::function0<void>(
00154         boost::bind(&UGenericCallback::syncEval, this, params, onDone)),
00155         taskLock);
00156     }
00157   }
00158 
00159   /* Note: to implement the LOCK_MODULE mode, we must delegate search of the
00160    * TaskLock to use to a function within the calling module.
00161    * That is why we take the TaskLock here and we do not find it ourselve.
00162    */
00163   void
00164   UGenericCallback::setAsync(libport::ThreadPool::rTaskLock l)
00165   {
00166     synchronous_ = false;
00167     taskLock = l;
00168   }
00169 
00170   libport::ThreadPool&
00171   UGenericCallback::threadPool()
00172   {
00173     static libport::ThreadPool tp;
00174     return tp;
00175   }
00176 
00177   void
00178   setThreadLimit(size_t nThreads)
00179   {
00180     UGenericCallback::threadPool().resize(nThreads);
00181   }

00187   UObject::UObject(int, impl::UContextImpl* impl)
00188     : UContext(impl)
00189     , __name("_dummy")
00190     , classname("_dummy")
00191     , derived(false)
00192     , autogroup(false)
00193     , remote(true)
00194     , impl_(ctx_->getObjectImpl())
00195     , taskLock_(new libport::ThreadPool::TaskLock)
00196   {
00197     impl_->initialize(this);
00198     objecthub = 0;
00199   }
00200 
00202   UObject::UObject(const std::string& s, impl::UContextImpl* impl)
00203     : UContext(impl)
00204     , __name(s)
00205     , classname(s)
00206     , derived(false)
00207     , autogroup(false)
00208     , remote(true)
00209     , impl_(ctx_->getObjectImpl())
00210     , taskLock_(new libport::ThreadPool::TaskLock)
00211   {
00212     impl_->initialize(this);
00213     objecthub = 0;
00214     autogroup = false;
00215     // Do not replace this call to init by a `, load(s, "load")' as
00216     // both result in "var <__name>.load = 1", which is not valid
00217     // until the two above lines actually create <__name>.
00218     load.init(__name, "load");
00219     // default
00220     load = 1;
00221   }

00242   void
00243   UObject::UJoinGroup(const std::string& gpname)
00244   {
00245     std::string groupregister = "addgroup " + gpname +" { "+__name+"};";
00246     send(groupregister);
00247   }

00249   libport::ThreadPool::rTaskLock
00250   UObject::getClassTaskLock()

00252     throw std::runtime_error("You must redefine getClassTaskLock to use"
00253                              " asynchronous calls with LOCK_CLASS locking");

00257   #define GENERIC_TRY(desc, code)                         \
00258   do {                                                    \
00259     std::string estr_;                                    \
00260     try {                                                 \
00261       code                                                \
00262     }                                                     \
00263     catch(const std::exception& e)                        \
00264     {                                                     \
00265       estr_ = e.what();                                   \
00266     }                                                     \
00267     catch(...)                                            \
00268     {                                                     \
00269       estr_ = "unknown exception";                        \
00270     }                                                     \
00271     if (!estr_.empty())                                   \
00272       GD_SERROR("Exception " << desc << " : " << estr_);  \
00273   } while(0)

00276   /*---------------.
00277   | UContextImpl.  |
00278   `---------------*/
00279   namespace impl
00280   {
00281     void
00282     UContextImpl::init()
00283     {
00284       setCurrentContext(this);
00285       foreach(baseURBIStarterHub* s, baseURBIStarterHub::list())
00286       {
00287         if (!libport::mhas(initialized, s))
00288         {
00289           GD_FINFO_TRACE("initializing UObject hub: %s", s->name);
00290           GENERIC_TRY("Instanciating hub" << s,
00291                       newUObjectHubClass(s);
00292                       initialized.insert(s);
00293                       );
00294         }
00295       }
00296       foreach(baseURBIStarter* s, baseURBIStarter::list())
00297       {
00298         if (!libport::mhas(initialized, s))
00299         {
00300           GD_FINFO_TRACE("initializing UObject: %s", s->name);
00301           GENERIC_TRY("Instanciating object" << s,
00302                       newUObjectClass(s);
00303                       initialized.insert(s);
00304                       );
00305         }
00306       }
00307     }
00308 #undef GENERIC_TRY
00309     bool
00310     UContextImpl::bind(const std::string& n, std::string rename)
00311     {
00312       foreach(baseURBIStarter* s, baseURBIStarter::list())
00313       {
00314         if (s->name == n)
00315         {
00316           s->instanciate(this, rename);
00317           return true;
00318         }
00319       }
00320       return false;
00321     }
00322

00336     UContextImpl::getUObjectHub(const std::string& n)

00339     }

00341     UObject*
00342     UContextImpl::getUObject(const std::string& n)

00353   void
00354   echo(const char* format, ...)
00355   {
00356     if (format)
00357     {
00358       va_list arg;
00359       va_start(arg, format);
00360       vfprintf(stderr, format, arg);
00361       va_end(arg);
00362     }
00363   }

00385   std::string getFilteredHostname()
00386   {
00387     char hn[1024];
00388     gethostname(hn, 1024);
00389     std::string res = hn;
00390     if (!isalpha(res[0]))
00391       res = "_" + res;
00392     foreach(char& c, res)
00393       if (!isalnum(c) && c != '_')
00394         c = '_';
00395     return res;
00396   }
